divs: sighting detailsjune 30th 7:00pm by: j. muirhead a group of us from http:\\paranormal.meetup.com\400\ were at the ault cemetery in ault colorado on 3rd ave on june 21st 2008 9:30 pm. there were 12 of us there doing a paranormal ghost investigation and saw what looked ike an odd shape going in and out of this tree at aprox.9:40pm.it was about the size of 2basket balls side by side visualy.we all thought it was a moving orb of the spirit kind or possibly a baking tin stuck in the tree as there are no lights around the tree. three people took pictures as they were getting excited about seeing a possible sprit, but i have seen this one and thought i would send it to you as i am a ghost investigator and not a ufologist or ufo investigator. http:\\photos2.meetupstatic.com\photos\event\7\1\9\f\highres_4589087.jpeg after this picture was taken we saw lots of things that looked like shooting stars and an object that went realy bright and then slowly dimmed till nothing was there at about 9:47 pm in the eastern skyline.we left at 10pm. as members send me more pictures i will send them to you. j. muirhead -countess organizer of the ncap group.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: there have been no other sightings in ault\ eaton\pierce
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: A light dances around a tree, this is what was on camera.
